extendedInfo.description: NOTE: For Android 4.x Devices donât install this client, instead install the âF5 BIG-IP Edge Clientâ. Use this client for Samsung Devices with Android 2.x. The BIG-IPÂ® Edge Clientâ¢ for Samsung Devices secures and accelerates mobile device access to enterprise networks and applications using SSL VPN and optimization technologies. Access is provided as part of an enterprise deployment of F5 BIG-IPÂ® Access Policy Managerâ¢, Edge Gatewayâ¢, or FirePassâ¢ SSL-VPN solutions.  The following Samsung Devices are supported:- Galaxy S model GT-I9000 (Gingerbread Maintenance Release)- Galaxy S model SC-02B(SGH-N013)- Galaxy S model SCH-I500- Galaxy S2 model GT-I9100- Galaxy S2 model GT-I9100G- Galaxy S2 model GT-I9100T- Galaxy S2 model GT-I9100M- Galaxy S2 model SC-02C(SGH-N033)- Galaxy S2 model SGH-T989- Galaxy S2 model SHW-M250K- Galaxy S2 model SHW-M250L- Galaxy S2 model SHW-M250S- Galaxy S2 model GT-I9103- Galaxy Tab model GT-P1000 (Gingerbread Maintenance Release)- Galaxy Tab model GT-P1000M- Galaxy Tab model GT-P1000R- Galaxy Tab model SC-01C(SGH-N023)- Galaxy Tab model SCH-I800NOTE: You may need to install a latest firmware update on your Samsung device to be able to use the application.BIG-IPÂ® Edge Clientâ¢ for Samsung Devices Features:- Provides accelerated mobile access when used with F5 BIG-IPÂ® Edge Gateway- Automatically roams between networks to stay connected on the go- Full Layer 3 network access to all your enterprise applications and filesRequirements: (Contact your IT Administrator)- See list of Samsung Devices- F5 BIG-IPÂ® Edge Gateway, Access Policy Manager or FirePass SSL VPN solutionsBEFORE YOU DOWNLOAD OR USE THIS APPLICATION YOU MUST AGREE TO THE EULA HERE: http://www.f5.com/apps/android-help-portal/eula.html

reviews.title: Work on Wifi only
reviews.comment: Tried connecting this software through 3G or Edge or GPRS but it has never been connected even once. The same mobile network can work with other remote control like TeamViewer very smoothly. Mine is SGS2.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: To the whiners
reviews.comment: If you don\'t have a Samsung get the Edge Client for rooted devices!  Almost all users report that it works on almost all devices.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Overly strict compatability
reviews.comment: I tried to use this on my Acer Iconia A501 to connect to work. Android market says it\'s compatible. The application installs, but when I try and run it it aborts saying it\'s not compatible. I would have at least been able to try it to see if it would work.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Terrible device support
reviews.comment: Why release something to the public that only supports Samsung devices. Is there really that big of a difference between Android on Samsung and the Motorola devices?
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Does not work with XOOM
reviews.comment: Before i download it says on Market that it is compatible with my device, but when i install it and try to run it, a little popup shows up saying \"Error - This device is supported\". They need to clear this out! I cant believe they dont have this working for Android tablets, its been on iPad for a while now.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Works like a champ
reviews.comment: Connects me right to the gateway and no lame rooting required!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Terrible. Open to more devices already!!
reviews.comment: Come on F5!  Get with it and open this up to more devices!  We\'ve waited long enough!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Fantastic
reviews.comment: Works a treat on galaxy s2
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: After long wait
reviews.comment: It work great.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Not Usable because
reviews.comment: It is only for samsung. Read the comments before downloading.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Configuration not shown
reviews.comment: Using galaxy tab 7.7, missing configurations.

reviews.title: Seriously!!
reviews.comment: Limited device support.  Don\'t bother installing unless you have a Samsung device.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Does not work with Dell Streak or with Advent Vega.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: More devices please
reviews.comment: It\'s been months are you going to actually support the rest of the android world yet. Like the largest marketshare manufacturer HTC.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: TouchPad cm7
reviews.comment: Not supported. Needs to be updated plz.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Awesome! Works great on i9100.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: This device is not supported
reviews.comment: \"This device is not supported\" on Xoom... WHY? I gave it one star because at it\'s in the Android Market, but does me no good right now. Please support Xoom
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Ugh

reviews.comment: But it isn\'t compatable, how can it have the name Samsung ip f5 client?
